welcome_message_body: Welcome to Carcar, the charming city known for its historic colonial architecture, delicious local delicacies, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mat-Mat Carcar, Cebu
restaurants.description: Mat-Mat Carcar, Cebu is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Carcar.
restaurants.address: Carcar STRIP, Cebu South Road, 6019 Carcar, Cebu

restaurants.description: Mang Inasal is a bbq joint located in Carcar.

restaurants.name: 1878 Restaurant

restaurants.name: BreadAfterBread
restaurants.description: BreadAfterBread is a bakery located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Mactan-Cebu International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal exclusively for international flights, featuring modern facilities and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
